item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35

@Maxie35 wrote:

I cant make it work, when i put it on nothing happen, this is what my thing says:

else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583) { //ring of stone npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Can anybody please help me with this, and while were here, how do i make me transform into something and i have to put more then 1 items on, like a full gear of skeletal armour makes u turn into a skeleton npc?

Thanks for the people who will help me. Maxie35.
